pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Interface to 'Bloomberg Data License' // R interface to access prices and market data with the 'Bloomberg Data License' service from https://www.bloomberg.com/professional/product/data-license/. As a prerequisite, a valid Data License from 'Bloomberg' is needed together with the corresponding SFTP credentials and whitelisting of the IP from which accessing the service.
